verses.text: Whither is thy \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w*, O thou \w fairest|strong="H3303"\w* among \w women|strong="H0802"\w*? whither is thy \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* turned \w aside|strong="H6437"\w*? that we may \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* him with thee.

My \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* is gone \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into his \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, to the \w beds|strong="H6170"\w* of \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, to \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* in the \w gardens|strong="H1588"\w*, and to \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* \w lilies|strong="H7799"\w*.
I \add am\add* my \w beloved’s|strong="H1730"\w*, and my \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* \add is\add* mine: he \w feedeth|strong="H7462"\w* among the \w lilies|strong="H7799"\w*.

¶ Thou \add art\add* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w*, O my \w love|strong="H7474"\w*, as \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*, \w comely|strong="H5000"\w* as \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w terrible|strong="H0366"\w* as \add an army\add* with \w banners|strong="H1713"\w*.

Turn \w away|strong="H5437"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* from me, for \w they|strong="H1992"\w* have \w overcome|strong="H7292"\w* me: thy \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \add is\add* as a \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* of \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* that \w appear|strong="H1570"\w* from \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.\f + \fr 6.5 \ft overcome…: or, puffed me up\f*

Thy \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \add are\add* as a \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* of \w sheep|strong="H7353"\w* which go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w washing|strong="H7367"\w*, whereof every one beareth \w twins|strong="H8382"\w*, and \add there is\add* not one \w barren|strong="H7909"\w* among them.
As a \w piece|strong="H6400"\w* of a \w pomegranate|strong="H7416"\w* \add are\add* thy \w temples|strong="H7541"\w* \w within|strong="H1157"\w* thy \w locks|strong="H6777"\w*.

There are \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w queens|strong="H4436"\w*, and \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*, and \w virgins|strong="H5959"\w* without \w number|strong="H4557"\w*.

My \w dove|strong="H3123"\w*, my \w undefiled|strong="H8535"\w* is \add but\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; she \add is\add* the \add only\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of her \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, she \add is\add* the \w choice|strong="H1249"\w* \add one\add* of her that \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* her. The \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* her, and \w blessed|strong="H0833"\w* her; \add yea\add*, the \w queens|strong="H4436"\w* and the \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*, and they \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* her.

¶ Who \add is\add* she \add that\add* looketh \w forth|strong="H8259"\w* as the \w morning|strong="H7837"\w*, \w fair|strong="H3303"\w* as the \w moon|strong="H3842"\w*, \w clear|strong="H1249"\w* as the \w sun|strong="H2535"\w*, \add and\add* \w terrible|strong="H0366"\w* as \add an army\add* with \w banners|strong="H1713"\w*?

I went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w garden|strong="H1594"\w* of \w nuts|strong="H0093"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w fruits|strong="H0003"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H5158"\w*, \add and\add* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* whether the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w flourished|strong="H6524"\w*, \add and\add* the \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* \w budded|strong="H5132"\w*.

Or ever I was \w aware|strong="H3045"\w*, my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* me \add like\add* the \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* of \w Amminadib|strong="H5993"\w*.\f + \fr 6.12 \ft Or ever…: Heb. I knew not\f*\f + \fr 6.12 \ft made…: or, set me on the chariots of my willing people\f*

\w Return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, O \w Shulamite|strong="H7759"\w*; \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, that we may \w look|strong="H2372"\w* upon thee. What will ye \w see|strong="H2372"\w* in the \w Shulamite|strong="H7759"\w*? As it were the \w company|strong="H4246"\w* of two \w armies|strong="H4264"\w*.\f + \fr 6.13 \ft of…: or, of Mahanaim\f*
